text: Moises Esmeralda Pons (born May 30, 1976 in Barcelona) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind and a F12/T12/B2 type athlete. He jumped at the 1996 Summer Paralympics and finished second in the F12 long jump. == References == Category:Spanish long jumpers Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T12 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2 Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona
title: Moises Esmeralda Pons
